mapper.select: SELECT m.mission_id AS missionId, m.questionnaire_id AS questionnaireId, q.questionnaire_title AS questionnaireTitle, q.questionnaire_subtitle AS questionnaireSubtitle, m.min_submit_count AS minSubmitCount FROM questionnaire AS q, mapping_mission_questionnaire AS m WHERE q.questionnaire_id=m.questionnaire_id ORDER BY m.mission_id

SELECT answer_paper_id AS answerPaperId, submit_user_tel AS submitUserTel, fill_answer_time AS fillAnswerTime, submit_time AS submitTime FROM answer_paper WHERE questionnaire_id=#{questionnaireId} AND mission_id=#{missionId}
